majorLocations.name: Abandoned City
majorLocations.description: You see the remnants of towering skyscrapers looming over the desolate streets. The air is thick with decay and the eerie silence is occasionally broken by distant echoes.

minorLocations.name: City Center
minorLocations.description: You feel the presence of ruined skyscrapers and looted shops standing as silent witnesses to the chaos that once engulfed this place.

events.name: Scavenger Encounter
events.description: A group of scavengers appear, searching for valuable items among the ruins.

events.name: Building Collapse
events.description: You hear a sudden rumble as part of a building collapses nearby.

minorLocations.name: Subway Station
minorLocations.description: You glance at the collapsed tunnels and abandoned trains, creating a labyrinthine underworld filled with darkness and mystery.

events.name: Mutant Ambush
events.description: A group of mutants emerges from the shadows, ready to attack.

events.name: Hidden Cache
events.description: You discover a hidden cache of supplies tucked away in an old maintenance room.

minorLocations.name: Central Park
minorLocations.description: It feels overgrown with wild vegetation, this once-beautiful park now hides makeshift shelters and forgotten secrets.

events.name: Wild Animal Encounter
events.description: You hear the rustle of leaves as a wild animal appears, eyeing you cautiously.

events.name: Hidden Survivor
events.description: A lone survivor emerges from a hidden shelter, seeking help.

minorLocations.name: Residential District
minorLocations.description: You see destroyed homes and hidden caches that tell tales of the families that once lived here, now long gone.

events.name: Booby Trap
events.description: You trigger a booby trap set by former residents, narrowly avoiding injury.

events.name: Secret Basement
events.description: You discover a secret basement filled with old supplies and personal belongings.

majorLocations.name: Military Base
majorLocations.description: You feel the imposing structure with fortified walls and abandoned equipment, this base once held the promise of protection and power.

minorLocations.name: Headquarters
minorLocations.description: You glance at the deserted offices and secret archives hinting at the strategic decisions made within these walls.

events.name: Security System Activation
events.description: The old security system activates, creating an obstacle to navigate.

events.name: Lost Plans
events.description: You find strategic plans left behind, revealing valuable information.

minorLocations.name: Armory
minorLocations.description: It gives a sense of vast depot of weapons and research labs, now gathering dust and cobwebs.

events.name: Weapon Cache
events.description: You discover a cache of weapons, some still functional.

events.name: Ambush
events.description: A group of raiders ambushes you, trying to claim the weapons for themselves.

minorLocations.name: Training Grounds
minorLocations.description: You see obstacle courses and military vehicles lay abandoned, memories of the rigorous drills that once took place here.

events.name: Patrol Encounter
events.description: A lone military patrol, left behind, mistakes you for an enemy.

events.name: Old Equipment
events.description: You find old military equipment that might be useful.

minorLocations.name: Military Prison
minorLocations.description: You hear echoes of the past haunting the cells and interrogation rooms, telling stories of those who were once held captive.

events.name: Prisoner Ghost
events.description: You encounter the ghost of a former prisoner, lingering with unfinished business.

events.name: Hidden Exit
events.description: You discover a hidden exit used by escaping prisoners.

majorLocations.name: Survivor Settlement
majorLocations.description: You feel a beacon of hope amidst the desolation, this settlement is a bustling hub of activity where survivors have rebuilt their lives.

minorLocations.name: Market
minorLocations.description: You see stalls and workshops buzzing with the trade and barter of goods essential for survival.

events.name: Weapon Vendor
events.description: A vendor appears, offering rare weapons for trade.

events.name: Thief Encounter
events.description: You catch a thief trying to steal supplies from a stall.

minorLocations.name: Village
minorLocations.description: You look at the simple huts and cultivated fields, a testament to the resilience and ingenuity of its inhabitants.

events.name: Crop Failure
events.description: You notice the crops are failing due to contaminated soil.

events.name: Community Gathering
events.description: You join a community gathering, learning about the villagers' struggles and hopes.

minorLocations.name: Security Post
minorLocations.description: You see a lookout tower and communal armory ensuring the safety and defense of the settlement.

events.name: Guard Patrol
events.description: You encounter a patrol of guards maintaining order.

events.name: Alarm Trigger
events.description: The security alarm is triggered, putting the settlement on high alert.

minorLocations.name: Hospital
minorLocations.description: You hear the bustling of an improvised clinic stocked with precious medical supplies, offering a glimmer of hope for the sick and injured.

events.name: Medicine Shortage
events.description: You find the hospital struggling with a shortage of critical medicines.

events.name: Injured Survivor
events.description: You assist in treating a severely injured survivor who just arrived.

majorLocations.name: Industrial Ruins
majorLocations.description: You see a once hub of manufacturing and progress, now a graveyard of twisted metal and broken machinery.

minorLocations.name: Automobile Factory
minorLocations.description: You look at the silent assembly lines and unfinished vehicles standing as relics of a bygone era of industry.

events.name: Machine Activation
events.description: You accidentally activate a machine, causing a loud commotion.

events.name: Hidden Workshop
events.description: You discover a hidden workshop still functioning.

minorLocations.name: Power Plant
minorLocations.description: It feels like silent generators and control rooms tell of a time when electricity powered the world.

events.name: Generator Surge
events.description: A generator suddenly surges, sparking dangerously.

events.name: Energy Source
events.description: You find a small but functional energy source.

minorLocations.name: Scrapyard
minorLocations.description: You see mountains of scrap metal and makeshift workshops serving as a resource for the desperate and the inventive.

events.name: Scrap Dealer
events.description: A scrap dealer offers to trade valuable parts.

events.name: Hidden Treasure
events.description: You find a hidden treasure among the piles of scrap.

minorLocations.name: Chemical Complex
minorLocations.description: You see leaking tanks and abandoned laboratories holding the dangerous remnants of chemical experiments.

events.name: Chemical Spill
events.description: A chemical spill poses a dangerous hazard.

events.name: Mutated Creature
events.description: You encounter a mutated creature born from the toxic waste.

majorLocations.name: Deserted University
majorLocations.description: You feel a place of learning and innovation now lying in ruin, its halls echoing with the ghosts of students and scholars.

minorLocations.name: Library
minorLocations.description: You glance at the dusty books and data archives offering knowledge and secrets from the past, waiting to be rediscovered.

events.name: Book Discovery
events.description: You find an ancient book with valuable information.

events.name: Library Collapse
events.description: Part of the library collapses, blocking your way.

minorLocations.name: Research Labs
minorLocations.description: You see scientific equipment and abandoned experiments hinting at the groundbreaking work that was once conducted here.

events.name: Experiment Gone Wrong
events.description: An old experiment suddenly reactivates, causing chaos.

events.name: Research Notes
events.description: You find detailed research notes that could prove useful.

minorLocations.name: Dormitories
minorLocations.description: You look at the ravaged rooms and makeshift refuges speaking of the students who once called this place home.

events.name: Ghost Encounter
events.description: You encounter the ghost of a former student, lingering with unfinished business.

events.name: Hidden Journal
events.description: You find a hidden journal detailing the final days of the university.

minorLocations.name: Auditorium
minorLocations.description: You hear collapsed classrooms and lecture halls now serving as haunting reminders of a world that once valued knowledge.

events.name: Old Lecture
events.description: You find an old lecture recording that sheds light on past events.

events.name: Structural Collapse
events.description: Part of the auditorium collapses, creating a dangerous situation.

majorLocations.name: Underground Shelter
majorLocations.description: You feel a subterranean refuge designed to withstand the apocalypse, now a labyrinth of survival and decay.

minorLocations.name: Command Center
minorLocations.description: You glance at the control panels and strategic maps lying abandoned, remnants of the plans once made to survive the apocalypse.

events.name: Control Panel Activation
events.description: You accidentally activate an old control panel, causing a system reboot.

events.name: Map Discovery
events.description: You find an old map detailing unexplored areas of the shelter.

minorLocations.name: Living Quarters
minorLocations.description: You see dormitories and mess halls where survivors once sought safety and community.

events.name: Hidden Room
events.description: You discover a hidden room filled with personal belongings.

events.name: Ghostly Whisper
events.description: You hear ghostly whispers from the past, filling you with unease.

minorLocations.name: Maintenance Area
minorLocations.description: You glance at the workshops and generators, the heart of the shelter’s infrastructure now silent and still.

events.name: Generator Failure
events.description: A generator suddenly fails, plunging the area into darkness.

events.name: Tool Discovery
events.description: You find a set of tools that could prove useful.

minorLocations.name: Supply Depot
minorLocations.description: You see warehouses stocked with food, water, and medical supplies, the lifeblood of the underground community.

events.name: Supply Shortage
events.description: You discover a critical shortage of supplies, causing panic.

events.name: Supply Drop
events.description: You find a hidden supply drop left behind by previous occupants.

majorLocations.name: Devastated Countryside
majorLocations.description: You feel a once-idyllic rural landscape now scarred by the ravages of nuclear fallout and time.

minorLocations.name: Abandoned Farm
minorLocations.description: You see fields overrun with weeds and barns crumbling to dust, memories of a simpler time.

events.name: Wild Animal Attack
events.description: You are suddenly attacked by a wild animal protecting its territory.

events.name: Old Farm Equipment
events.description: You discover old farm equipment that might still be useful.

minorLocations.name: Contaminated Lake
minorLocations.description: You look at the radioactive waters teeming with mutated wildlife, a hazardous reminder of the fallout.

events.name: Water Contamination
events.description: You accidentally come into contact with contaminated water, posing a health risk.

events.name: Mutant Fish
events.description: You see a mutant fish, a testament to the lake's contamination.

minorLocations.name: Destroyed Village
minorLocations.description: You glance at the ruined homes and derelict churches telling of a community that once thrived here.

events.name: Ghost Town
events.description: You feel the eerie presence of a ghost town, as if the spirits of the past still linger.

events.name: Hidden Bunker
events.description: You discover a hidden bunker beneath one of the houses.

minorLocations.name: Mutant Forest
minorLocations.description: You feel twisted trees and unnatural wildlife creating a forest that is both beautiful and terrifying.

events.name: Mutant Creature Attack
events.description: A mutant creature suddenly attacks you from the shadows.

events.name: Rare Herb
events.description: You find a rare herb that could be valuable for medicine or trade.

majorLocations.name: Port City
majorLocations.description: A once-bustling hub of trade and travel, now a decaying waterfront haunted by the specters of the past. You see crumbling piers and hear the distant call of seagulls echoing through the empty streets.

minorLocations.name: Docks
minorLocations.description: Sunken ships and abandoned containers line the decaying piers, whispering tales of lost voyages. You feel the cool breeze carrying the scent of salt and rust.

events.name: Looters
events.description: You encounter a group of looters scavenging the area for valuable items.

events.name: Capsized Ship
events.description: You discover a capsized ship with potential supplies still on board.

minorLocations.name: Fish Market
minorLocations.description: Deserted stalls and warehouses that once buzzed with life, now silent and desolate. You see rotting wooden stalls and the remnants of seafood scattered around.

events.name: Mysterious Stranger
events.description: A mysterious stranger offers you valuable information in exchange for help.

events.name: Market Collapse
events.description: Part of the market collapses, creating a dangerous situation.

minorLocations.name: Lighthouse
minorLocations.description: A deteriorating beacon that once guided ships safely to shore, now a lonely sentinel. You look up at the towering structure, its light long extinguished.

events.name: Old Journal
events.description: You find an old journal detailing the lighthouse keeper's last days.

events.name: Signal Flare
events.description: You discover a functional signal flare that could be used in emergencies.

minorLocations.name: Suburbs
minorLocations.description: Abandoned homes and schools, echoes of a community that has long since vanished. You feel the eerie silence and see overgrown lawns and broken windows.

events.name: Hidden Stash
events.description: You find a hidden stash of supplies in one of the houses.

events.name: Bandit Raid
events.description: You encounter a bandit raid in progress, forcing you to choose between fight or flight.
